TITLE: Network Settings
MSG_0: This view changes the setting of network.
MSG_1:
On Demand Stream Port Number

The port number is RTSP connect port number of your iOS device.

The parameter is limited from 1 to 65535.
MSG_2:
Authentication

The RTSP connect user is limited the RTSP authentication.

The authentication type is digest method.
MSG_3:
Push Stream Authentication

These user name and password are RTSP authentication of push mode.

If the broadcast server requests the authentication,

a authentication dialog are shown on the main view.

These authenticated user name and password

are filled to these text fields.
MSG_4:
Transport Type for Push Stream

This switch changes

network transport stream(UDP/TCP) for

push stream method.
MSG_5:
Packet Size

This parameter is

media size of RTP payload.

In the network characteristic, the packet size limits

adjusted by this parameter.

These packet sizes are shown as below.
